node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，無外遊記錄，居於水泉澳邨明泉樓，就讀於九龍城浸信會禧年（恩平）小學。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and no recent travel history. She lives at Ming Chuen House, Shui Chuen O Estate, studying at Kowloon City Baptist Church Hay Nien (Yan Ping) Primary School.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en: Ming Chuen House, Shui Chuen O Estate
groups.description_zh: 2020 年 7 月 10 日首先出現 11 宗確診個案，全部居於明泉樓，不少患者曾到過該邨的食肆、街市和商場。患者居於 10 個單位，分布較散，在不同樓層及座向。衞生防護中心指爆發與喉管糞渠無直接關係，較大可能與共用設施有關，惟全部環境樣本化驗結果均呈陰性。
groups.description_en: On July 10, 2020, 11 individuals, all of whom reside in Ming Chuen House, tested positive for the coronavirus. Many of the patients had been to the restaurants, market, and shopping malls in the Estate. The individuals collectively live in 10 different apartments, and were relatively scattered on different floors and blocks of the Estate. The CHP stated that the outbreak was unrelated to the plumbing of fecal matter, but more likely to be related to the facilities that were shared. However, all environmental samples taken from the Estate tested negative for the presence of the coronavirus.

node.location_zh: 九龍城浸信會禧年(恩平)小學
node.location_en: Kowloon City Baptist Church Hay Nien (Yan Ping) Primary School
Sun Chui Shopping Centre Pizza Hut (non-residential)
Ming Chuen House, Shui Chuen O Estate
